Title: Relates to reimbursement of costs associated with capture and return rehabilitation of animals escaped from slaughterhouses
Summary: Requires the owner of any place or establishment where animals or fowls are slaughtered or butchered for food to reimburse costs associated with capture and return or rescue and rehabilitation of escaped animals.
LawCode: Add ยง96-e-1, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring the owner of any place or establishment where animals or fowls are slaughtered or butchered for food to reimburse costs associated with capture and return or rescue and rehabilitation of escaped animals
